name: You can apply for a final order (applicant) JOINT and SOLE
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

You can now apply for a 'final order'. This is a court document that will legally end your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)). 

((joint conditional order??This is a joint application so both you and your ))((husbandJoint??husband))((wifeJoint??wife))((civilPartnerJoint??civil partner))((joint conditional order?? have to apply. They have been sent this email too.))

^If you have not yet finished any negotiations or legal proceedings about your money, property or other assets then you should seek legal advice before ((isDivorce??finalising your divorce.))((isDissolution??ending your civil partnership.))

Sign in to your HMCTS account and apply for a 'final order': ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service 
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) 

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: ((isReminder??Reminder: ))Action required: your ((isDivorce??divorce application:))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership:))
